answers.author: Derek Johnson
answers.text:
Pamela,
Though ICMA does not endorse or specifically recommend any of these choices, here is a list of vendors who sell floor-to-ceiling cabinets for offices:
http://www.ancom-filing.com/products/mobile-filing-systems/high-density-file-systems
This company offers large high density, movable filing cabinets that roll on a track system to decrease the amount of office space used. They also offer free space analysis and room layout. 
This company offers large storage cabinets designed specifically for government work. They can hold files and act as storage for other equipment and materials. 
http://office-storage.nationalbusinessfurniture.com/Fully-Assembled-Jumbo-Steel-Storage-Cabinet-24D-31482.aspx
This company offers customizable storage solutions for offices. 
http://office-storage.nationalbusinessfurniture.com/Fully-Assembled-Jumbo-Steel-Storage-Cabinet-24D-31482.aspx
Derek Johnson

author: Pamela Muse
text:
The City of Redondo Beach, CA is moving its Recreation and Community Services Department from a 12,000 square foot campus to a 6,000 sq. foot modular structure. They have a very paper-intensive group of services (including federally funded housing assistance, etc.) and storage has become a real problem. They are looking for filing and storage systems that can help maximize the space - e.g. floor to ceiling moving systems, as opposed to four foot metal cabinets, etc. 
If you can suggest storage solutions, Vendors or any relative information, please forward ASAP. 
Thank you! 
Pamela Muse 
Western Regional Director 
Alliance for Innovation 
888-468-6450 
pmuse@transformgov.org
title: Storage Solutions
